00032 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 
00042         public function process() {
00043 
00044 
00045                 //read redirect page
00046                 $emailRedirect = $this->settings['redirectPage'];
00047 
00048                 $url = "";
00049 
00050                 if(!isset($emailRedirect)) {
00051                         return;
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 //if redirect_page was page id
00055                 if (is_numeric($emailRedirect)) {
00056 
00057                         // these parameters have to be added to the redirect url
00058                         $addparams = array();
00059                         if (t3lib_div::_GP("L")) {
00060                                 $addparams["L"] = t3lib_div::_GP("L");
00061                         }
00062                                 
00063                         $url = $this->cObj->getTypoLink_URL($emailRedirect, '',$addparams);
00064                                 
00065                         //else it may be a full URL
00066                 } else {
00067                         $url = $emailRedirect;
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 //correct the URL by replacing &amp;
00071                 if ($this->settings['correctRedirectUrl']) {
00072                         $url = str_replace('&amp;', '&', $url);
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 if($url) {
00076                         header("Location: ".t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($url));
00077                 }
00078                 exit();
00079         }
00080 
00088         public function loadConfig($gp,$tsConfig) {
00089                 $this->gp = $gp;
00090                 $this->settings = $tsConfig;
00091                 $redirect = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'redirect_page','sMISC');
00092                 if($redirect) {
00093                         $this->settings['redirectPage'] = $redirect;
00094                 }
00095         }
00096 
00097 }
